intro: Here are some of my favorite books, albums, and movies.
Books: High Fidelity by Nick Hornby
White Teeth by Zadie Smith
Paradise by Toni Morrison
City of Girls by Elizabeth Gilbert
Mythology by Edith Hamilton
The House of Mirth by Edith Wharton
HOPE by Andrew Idler
Six Feet Over by Mary Roach
The Marriage Plot by Jeffrey Eugenides
The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian by Sherman Alexie
The Only Good Indians by Stephen Graham Jones
The Pandora Room by Christopher Golden
The Chill by Scott Carson
A Streetcar Named Desire by Tennessee Williams
Death of a Salesman by Arthur Miller
Cat on a Hot Tin Roof by Edward Albee
Leslie F***ing Jones by Leslie Jones
The Yellow House by Sarah Broom
The Masterplan by Oasis
Minas by Yoko Ogawa
You Are Here by David Nicholls
Heaven and Earth Grocery Store by James McBride
Manila Takes Manhattan
Glorious Exploits by Ferdia Lennon
The Bullet That Missed by Richard Osman
Bronshtein in the Bronx by Robert Littell
Marble Hall Murders by Anthony Horowitz
Eve by Cat Bohannon

Albums: The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill by Lauryn Hill
Ella Fitzgerald Sings the Duke Ellington Songbook by Ella Fitzgerald
Songs: Can't Stop by Red Hot Chili Peppers
Crazy Stupid Love by Laundry Day
Dani California by Red Hot Chili Peppers

Movies: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
